Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You see the buildings atop the cliff?<sp:5:0:0>
That's <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>.

That's where the business desk is for
<clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>, where I work.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Hudson Construction is a company that
handled assembly of Lookout Landing and
the Skyview Towers, to name a few.
President Hudson is always saying things
like "there's nothing I can't make!"

Anyhoo. If you're headed to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>,
use the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The rain makes everything slick, so you'd
better watch your footing.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Son and done!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400>Hey! It's rare to have visitors at the
workshop. Were you looking for the
entrance to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>?
If you're going there, the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>
right in front of you should come
in handy.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>It's a suspended cart that'll take you from
this workshop to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>, like son
and done!
<sp:3:0:2:0001>It's President Hudson's pride and joy!
It doesn't cost anything to use, so use
it whenever you like.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Careful of the lightning! You should
remove all your metal gear before you
get on.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Lately folks have been into affixing
decorations to weapons and shields
and such.
Turns out most of them can't deconstruct
what they've done, so my brother Pelison
started a business to <clr:0000>do it for them<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>He gets it doneâ€”son and done! Give it
a shot sometime.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's pretty dark, so watch your step when
you get on the railcar.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Son and done!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400>If you want to go to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>, try
using the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0025:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0001>Phew, the Zonai device isn't broken. Up next, this
goes like thiiis...<sp:5:1:0> There.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_9006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_01>I'll replace it with a new one, so come on
over to the construction site for a minute.
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Whew. It was a cinch to fix, but still...


<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>Ease up so it doesn't break again, will ya!
Talk_9007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>Thanks for waiting! These things don't
last forever, so make sure you don't ride
for too long, OK?
Talk_0017: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Aw, shoot! The railcar! Hang on a sec!
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you wanna move or stop the railcar,
<clr:0000>just strike it<clr:ffff> directly.
Talk_0028:
You're welcome to ride it, but can ya be
more careful? You're not the only one
who uses it.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00>I'll fix it up. Just hang on.
Talk_9009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>That doesn't belong to you. I'm gonna ask
you to return it.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseS_01>All right, there we go! If you're headed to
Tarrey Town, you can use the railcar!
Talk_9010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>If you want the railcar to roll, you can get
in and strike it. Carrying it around won't
do ya much good.
